summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Huile de Sfax product showcase website. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working correctly.
passed_tests: Olive oil products API endpoint (/api/products/olive-oil) - all 4 formats present
Kitchenware products API endpoint (/api/products/kitchenware) - all 4 products present
Contact form submission API (/api/contact) - successful submission with validation
Contact form validation - proper error handling for invalid data
Homepage loads with hero section, video background, and bento grid
Navigation works - all 5 nav links (Home, Olive Oil, Kitchenware, About, Contact) functional
Olive Oil page displays all 4 product formats (250ml, 750ml, 1L, 5L) with images
Kitchenware page displays all 4 products (Classic Cup, Cutting Board, Mortar, Heart Dish)
About page loads with brand story and company information
Contact page has functional contact form with validation and success messages
Footer displays on all pages with navigation and contact info
Mobile responsive navigation with hamburger menu working correctly
Contact form integration with backend API working properly

success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All pages, navigation, forms, and mobile responsiveness working
